title: Purpose statement
text:
Hello, I am Paulo Gugelmo Cavalheiro Dias, currently a graduate level economics students, and this is the first post of my blog, in which I would like to write its purpose statement.
I want this blog to be a way of sharing my progress in the topics I am interested in, i.e.Â economics and related subjects, such as programming for social sciences, environmental economics, etc. To do so, I will try to write regular reports on my work in social science, about my classes, readings and other materials.
